title: My friend is playing Minecraft!
body: I don't know what to do! My friend is playing Minecraft, should I ban him from life? Or remove Graves' cigar? TELL ME!!!

replies.body: Thank you all for noticing me even Sekai but sadly no senpai! But {{champion:103}} is still a slut!

Nothing wrong with Minecraft.

If you have the mental capacity to actually do things in that game instead of walking around punching trees endlessly then you're cool.

I used to have that game, I gave up because Survival takes way too long to do anything while I lack imagination and patience to play Creative. Shame really.

One time I was ADC, had a thresh support in ranked and he would sometimes afk in lane and almost die/die. We'll be like "wtf man" and he'll respond "sorry guys, just searching up minecraft mods on youtube" IN LANE
Remove Graves cigar because {{champion:103}}  is a slut
This thread is 150% serious! And it should not be taken as a joke!{{champion:103}} is a slut!
